p: A total of 2 ml blood was collected after 2 h of reperfusion. Serum was separated from the blood samples by centrifugation (2,000 × g, 10 min, 4°C) and used for the evaluation of creatine kinase-MB (CK-MB; cat. no. H197; Nanjing Jiancheng Bioengineering Institute), aminotransferase (AST; cat. no. C010-1-1; Nanjing Jiancheng Bioengineering Institute) and lactate dehydrogenase (LDH; cat. no. A020-2-2; Nanjing Jiancheng Bioengineering Institute) activities using respective diagnostic kits in accordance with the manufacturer's instructions.
